giddyup.config.warning: §c§lWARNING: §rThis option will only affect you in single player. If you wish to change it on multiplayer, you will have to manually edit the config on in the server files. ("./config/giddyup.json")
giddyup.config.restart: §cRequires a world relog if on singleplayer, or a server restart if on multiplayer.
giddyup.moveicons.tooltip: Move the dash HUD element placement. Requires you to be logged into a world.
giddyup.size.tooltip: The size of the HUD element
giddyup.spacing.tooltip: The spacing of each dash between one another
giddyup.easein.tooltip: Should the HUD element ease into place upon riding a horse?
giddyup.opacity.tooltip: Should the opacity of the icon slowly increase when recharging?
